title: Verify my email
body:
Hi.
When i tried to verify my email, I found that I typed wrong email address. So I couldn't receive email.
Before @ is right, but I typed gamil.com instead of gmail.com 
Can you correct it for me ? in order to get email.

replies.body:
I won't be able to do that on my own since account changes need to have some kind of 'papertrail' or in a more official capacity, but if you hurry and catch Live Chat before the hours close they can get that updated super quickly! 

Head on over to the [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) page and look for that live chat button. If it's not there, go ahead and shoot us that ticket and we'll get that fixed rather quickly!

you know there is no live chat and no option for report it. why does it so complicate and herd to find sending a private message to them!!
it is just simple thing that change mail address gamil.com to gmail.com.
it is obviously wrong.
link to me how to access to live chat or sending a private message

Sorry about that confusion, I had the ticket hyperlinked so you could click on that to get directed to the ticket page. Check this link for a ticket-> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Live Chat is also found on that ticket page towards the bottom!
